fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Factional chat
- No factional kill
- Dead members lose even if the faction wins.
- Members don't know what each other are doing each night.
- Aura: Fallen Angels have no defense if the faction has four or more living members, Basic if there's three, Powerful if there's two, and Invincible if there's only one.
- Piercing: Fallen Angels deal Basic attacks to non-Fallen Angels and attacks a level above the current Aura level to their teammates, which also bypasses all effects that would prevent it.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to crush all who would oppose the Fallen Angels.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Live to crush all who would oppose the Fallen Angels.
